By applying [[Blaze Release: Kagutsuchi|shape transformation]] to the orb of [[Fire Release|black flames]] wielded by his Susanoo, Sasuke manifests a blade in its hand for the purpose of slicing and piercing targets, thus setting them ablaze with the inextinguishable flames of [[Amaterasu]].
